item.title: Report E-2024100525
item.description:
Report E-2024100525

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-25
  • City: PORT ALLEN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1144 ET, XPO terminal LBL notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 2 teaspoons of UN1210 Video Jet Liquid Ink released from cardboard box due to reasons unknown. The release impacted trailer # 4350024. No storm drains or waterways are reported to be impacted by the release. The terminal contained and containerized the waste before the call was made to ERTS. The terminal used 50-Gallon poly drum for the waste.
